thread.title: Awful! Sore LOSER Sally Kohn wishes failure on kids in public ed JUST so she can say ‘I told you so’
thread.title_full: Awful! Sore LOSER Sally Kohn wishes failure on kids in public ed JUST so she can say ‘I told you so’

author: Sam J.
title: Awful! Sore LOSER Sally Kohn wishes failure on kids in public ed JUST so she can say ‘I told you so’
text:
Awful! Sore LOSER Sally Kohn wishes failure on kids in public ed JUST so she can say ‘I told you so’ Posted at 1:51 pm on February 7, 2017 by Sam J. Share on Facebook Share on Twitter 
Finally someone on the Left admits it, they don’t really care about education. All of this posturing was really just that, posturing. 
What does Sally Kohn tweet after the DeVos confirmation? Does she wish the DOE well? Does she hope for the best? 
No, she tweets this nonsense: Well at least now when #BetsyDeVos decimates public education, Democrats can rightfully say they tried to stop her. Thank you @SenateDems !! 
— Sally Kohn (@sallykohn) February 7, 2017 
Nothing about working with DeVos to see what can be done with middle ground, nothing about taking action to ensure children receive the best education possible regardless of who runs the department. 
Nope.
